snippet: Eleven states sued the Environmental Protection Agency on Friday over its delays in tightening air quality standards involving soot.
abstract: Eleven states sue the Environmental Protection Agency over its delays in tightening air quality standards involving soot.
lead_paragraph: Eleven states sued the Environmental Protection Agency on Friday over its delays in tightening air quality standards involving soot.

headline.seo: E.P.A. Is Sued Over Delays in Soot Standards
